PREMIER PROJET FORESTEIR DU MANGORO - MADAGASCAR

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would assist the Government
            in implementing an afforestation program of 96,000 ha pine
            plantations in the Mangoro valley and consists of: (i)
            afforestation of 35,000 ha of pine plantations; (ii) fire
            control and maintenance of all plantations within the
            project area; (iii) construction and maintenance of service
            roads and plantation roads; (iv) construction of Project
            Headquarters and staff and labor facilities; (v) research,
            training and future project preparation of future forestry
            projects and other projects within the agricultural sector;
            and (vi) pasture improvement on about 2,000 ha within the
            project area.
